reviews.text: EVERYTHING IS INCLUDED ! Breakfast, free parking, internet for wireless (and ethernet)
Rooms are gorgeous with jacqzuizis too.
reviews.title: Nice hotel
Wonderful Hotel, Great Location
reviews.text: I stayed at the Hampton Inn Williamsville over Memorial Day weekend (May 25-29) with my Father and Son. I was immediately impressed with the courteous front desk staff who were always available to answer questions and give directions.

The location is right in the heart of downtown Wiliiamsville which is an up and coming, quaint area with little shops, boutiques, a dessert restaurant (Butterwood) and a Starbucks all within a 2 block walk. If you forgot to pack anything, no problem, they share the same parking lot as Rite-aid which is great!
reviews.title: Starting to slip......

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were nicely decorated and spacious with fluffy down comforters and a large variety of comfy pillows that made you not want to get out of bed! The bathroon was large and beautifully decorated with marble and granite, and the water pressure of the shower was wonderful. Great lighting, just wish they had a swing-arm makeup mirror next to the hairdryer as the vanity is deep and it maes putting on your eye makeup tricky.
reviews.title: Very good for holiday travel

likes.liked: — A comforting and comfortable place to stay

reviews.text: The fitness room is very small but the machines are like new and clean and will do for a quick workout. It is also open 24 hours which is great for early-risers! The pool was empty every time I walked by, but was very large and clean and had a jacuzzi tub off to the side for the adults to relax in which looked inviting.
reviews.title: Not at all impressed

reviews.text: The complimentary breakfast was wonderful! It was a buffet style that offered a huge assortment of breads, yogurts, juices, cereals, and even 2 hot entrees (eggs, sausage, gravy for biscuits, etc.). It was always kept clean and filled and the kitchen staff was very pleasant and friendly to everyone.
reviews.title: Nice neighborhood
